items.title: California's controversial wealth tax proposal leaves billionaires with little way out
items.description: The Billionaire Tax Act would impose a one-time tax of 5% on the total wealth of California tax residents whose net worth is $1 billion or more.

items.title: Vista Equity Partners says its 'agentic factory' is reinventing the way companies use AI
